Weather for, NOV 1st, 2019

Quick Guide

To search for a place on the map scroll to the search box at the top navigation bar and input the name of the place.

Some city may appear in various country so its adviceable to put country after city for best result.

in order to check for weather report scroll to to top navigation bar where 'Home','ABOUT' and a search button appears
input your text in the text area just beside the search button and click 'search'
the weather reports appears on the main page ,right on top and above the buttons :'temperature in Cescuis','wind speed',etc.

you can convert temperature to celscuis or fahrenheit by clicking either buttons with the label on it,this would only display result when you have entered a location in the search box on the top navigation bar, the wind speed,humidity nd pessure works the same way.
